whatIsOkox.title: WHAT IS $OKOX?
whatIsOkox.subtitle: From Meme to Movement
points: On April 1, 2023, the official OKX account introduced a mascot during april fools.
It was supposed to be a one-day laugh.
But the internet had other plans.
Memes were born. Mentions kept coming.
And now, that same mascot lives onchain as a token powered by its community.
whatIsOkox.bottomLine: $OKOX isn't just a coin. It's a reminder that crypto culture builds itself — one meme at a time.

tokenomics.title: TOKENOMICS

tokenomics.lockedLiquidity: 87.37% — Locked in liquidity. No team tokens. No funny business.

bridge.title: How to Bridge
bridge.description: Move $OKOX between chains in 3 easy steps

steps.step1: Step 1: Open OKX wallet app on your mobile & click dex
steps.step2: Step 2: From the swap menu click the "from"
steps.step3: Step 3: From the drop down select the token you want to swap from
steps.step5: Step 5: In the drop down, copy and paste the $OKOX contract address and select the token
steps.step6: Step 6: enter the amount, click swap & voila!! It's done.
